document.name: ReportDataset
document.documentation: Report Dataset is used to capture data which is injected into a report template. This can be a BizQL or SQL query, or a string constant.

text.name: datasetName
text.description: The name this dataset will be made available to within the report definition.

enum.name: datasetType
enum.description: The type of this dataset; if it is a BizQL or SQL query, a fixed constant value or a dataset Class.

memo.name: query
memo.description: The query to retrieve this dataset for the report.

condition.name: typeClass
condition.description: True when the dataset type is a class, used to hide the results ouput

condition.name: typeConstant
condition.description: True when the dataset type is a constant, used to hide the parameters datagrid

condition.name: typeQuery
condition.description: True when the dataset type is a BizQL or SQL, used to show the parameters datagrid

condition.name: typeSqlQuery
condition.description: True when the dataset type is SQL, used to show help to the user

constraint.name: UniqueDatasetName
constraint.message: The dataset {datasetName} already exists for template {parent.name}.
